alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Colquitt; Cook (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 10:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Cook, Irwin, Berrien, Turner, northeastern Colquitt, Tift and central Worth Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1005 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Sylvester to near Ray City. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tifton, Nashville, Adel, Ashburn, Ocilla, Sylvester, Sparks, Enigma, Omega, Lenox, Poulan, Ty Ty, Alapaha, Phillipsburg, Mystic, Unionville, Worth, Terrell, Sycamore and Sumner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
